name: SWEDISH AMERICAN HEALTH SYSTEM
firms: ALEXANDER, BOROVICKA & O'SHEA GOVERNMENT SOLUTIONS (FKA ALEXANDER & BOROVICKA GO
sampleDescriptions: Monitored Health Care issues that could potentially affect the Hospital.
Inquiry regarding status of FCC grant program application
Advocated on behalf of Swedish American Hospital for funding via Congressionally Directed Spending with both Sen. Durbin's office and Sen. Duckworth's office.

Pursued Congressionally Directed Spending request in the FY 2023 omnibus spending bill from Senator Richard Durbin's office in the amount of $1M on behalf of client's insufficient NICU unit in Rockfor
Did not lobbying for or against and specific issue/legislation, but we did provide Cong. LaHood with a tour of our hospital in Rockford, IL.
